Actions.Name: Double Tap
Actions.Description: The [name] flies 3 spaces in a straight line. At the start and end of their movement, they may deal 2 damage to a character in range 3, choosing different characters each time.

Actions.Name: Blinding Grenade
Actions.Description: A foe in range 3 is blinded. Blinded foes take 3 damage.

Actions.Name: Takeoff
Actions.Description: The [name] launches into the air. While in this stance, they are flying and have evasion. They lose this stance if they are hit by an attack.
